server1 module

class server1.Server(host, port)[source]

Bases: object

broadcast(message, sender_username)[source]

Broadcasts a message to all users except the sender.

Parameters:

  • message (str) – The message to broadcast.

  • sender_username (str) – The username of the sender.

encrypt_file(plaintext, public_key, username)[source]

Encrypts a plaintext file.

Parameters:

  • plaintext (str) – The plaintext to encrypt.

  • public_key (RSA.RsaKey) – The public key for encryption.

  • username (str) – The username associated with the plaintext.

generate_user_mac_key()[source]

Generates a random MAC key for a user.

Returns:

The generated MAC key.

Return type:

bytes

handle_client(client_socket, client_address)[source]

Handles communication with a client.

Parameters:

  • client_socket (socket.socket) – The client socket.

  • client_address (tuple) – The client’s address.

register_user(username, client_socket, client_public_key)[source]

Registers a user with their username, socket, and public key.

Parameters:

  • username (str) – The username of the user.

  • client_socket (socket.socket) – The socket object associated with the user.

  • client_public_key (RSA.RsaKey) – The public key of the user.

remove_log_messages(client_socket, sender_username)[source]

Removes log messages for a user.

Parameters:

  • client_socket (socket.socket) – The client socket.

  • sender_username (str) – The username of the sender.

send_log_messages(client_socket, sender_username)[source]

Sends log messages to a client.

Parameters:

  • client_socket (socket.socket) – The client socket.

  • sender_username (str) – The username of the sender.

send_mac_key_encrypted(client_socket, client_public_key)[source]

Sends the MAC key encrypted to a client.

Parameters:

  • client_socket (socket.socket) – The client socket.

  • client_public_key (RSA.RsaKey) – The client’s public key.

send_message(client_socket, message, sender_username)[source]

Sends a message to a client.

Parameters:

  • client_socket (socket.socket) – The client socket.

  • message (str) – The message to send.

  • sender_username (str) – The username of the sender.

send_public_key(client_socket)[source]

Sends the server’s public key to a client.

Parameters:

client_socket (socket.socket) – The client socket.

setup_database()[source]

Sets up the SQLite database for storing messages.

start()[source]

Starts the server and listens for incoming connections.

store_message(sender, message)[source]

Stores a message from a sender.

Parameters:

  • sender (str) – The username of the sender.

  • message (str) – The message to store.

server1.decrypt_private_key(encrypted_key_data, passphrase)[source]

Decrypts an encrypted private key using a passphrase.

Parameters:

  • encrypted_key_data (bytes) – The encrypted private key data.

  • passphrase (str) – The passphrase used for decryption.

Returns:

The decrypted private key.

Return type:

RSA.RsaKey or None

server1.encrypt_private_key(private_key, passphrase)[source]

Encrypts a private key with a passphrase.

Parameters:

  • private_key (RSA.RsaKey) – The private key to be encrypted.

  • passphrase (str) – The passphrase to encrypt the private key.

Returns:

The encrypted private key.

Return type:

bytes
